frontmatter.title: Model Binding in ASP.NET Razor Pages

nodes.excerpt:
The ASP.NET Razor Pages framework automatically binds Http request parameters to our controller paramters.
In this post we look at the basics of Http form posts before understanding how we can bind our html controls to the

frontmatter.title: A simple ASP.NET Razor Pages starter template

nodes.excerpt:
The default ASP.NET web templates create applications with quite a lot of bloat.
Sometimes we just want a simpler application with just the features installed that
we are intressted in. This article describes how to create a barebones Razor pages
app starting with the empty web app template and…
